name: ashtech/nri-why-choose
title: NRI Why Choose
description: NRI why choose section with 5 numbered items

title.default:
A Trusted Address in One of
India's Fastest-Growing Regions

item1Desc.default: Backed by Ashtech Group's 30+ years in India's infrastructure and construction materials sector.

item2Desc.default: Sector 12, Greater Noida West—close to upcoming Jewar Airport, Delhi, and NCR business districts.

item3Desc.default: Every construction phase is third-party audited, ensuring transparency and excellence.

item4Desc.default: A rare offering in NCR—space, serenity, and sustainability designed into every square foot.

item5Desc.default: Complete digital documentation, NRI-friendly financing, and end-to-end concierge services.
